title: The Jones/McCarthy Sleepover, Coaching Trends, Tua's draft stock (Football 1/8)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson to talk all that's trending in the NFL. The guys speculate the details of a Jerry Jones/Mike McCarthy sleepover as reported before the Cowboys made their new coaching hire (4:55). Will, Brady and Ryan also discuss the types of coaching hires that were made in 2020 vs. 2019 and reasons for the philosophical shift (12:45) as well as if other teams could possibly try to copy the Saints' use of do-it-all "athlete" Taysom Hill (25:55). Lastly, a deep dive on the 2020 NFL Draft and the impact of Tua Tagovailoa declaring (33:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
